name: RIDE
content: 꼭 가야 할 곳이 있는 게 아니야
并不是有必须要去的地方
也不是因为今天天气好
멀리 가지 않아 걱정 안 해도 돼
不会走的太远 不用担心
Girl, do you wanna ride with me
'Cause I just wanna take you there
Girl, do you wanna ride with me
Oh baby, I just wanna take you there
若有想去的地方就说出来
멀리 가지 않아 걱정 안해도 돼
不会走的太远 不用担心
Girl, do you wanna ride with me
'Cause I just wanna take you there
Girl, do you wanna ride with me
Oh baby, I just wanna take you there
就这么前行 宝贝 你无需担心
Come and take a ride with me tonight
I just wanna take you, take you there
